name: cloudwatch-slack-alarms
description: An Amazon Lambda that receive alarm notifications for Coco from CloudWatch and posts to Slack. Based on [this](https://github.com/ashiina/aws-lambda-cloudwatch-slack). This depends on an SNS topic called `coco-alarms-slack`, to which Cloudwatch notifications are posted.

scripts.deploy: zip -r build.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name coco-alarms-slack-production --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build.zip && rm build.zip
